title: Make a deposit
depositInstructions: Send your tokens to the following address on the {{name}} network: {{address}} Once sent, paste your transaction hash in the form to confirm.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Please ensure you are sending the tokens via the correct network. Transactions on the wrong network may result in a permanent loss of funds, and we will not be able to recover them.

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an error processing your transaction. Please make sure the reference is correct. If the issue persists, please contact support.
